name: Rougebot
description:
Move with arrow keys and  Shoot with click.

This game was done for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam.

The theme was out of control and here you play as an out of control robot. The humans try to stop you and hack you in order to get control of you, if they success in their attempts you can lose control of yourself by forgetting moves or key shuffles.

To install it put the gmtk2020.exe inside the final.zip extracted folder
